entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Amos
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, -13.0°C

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning then northwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
